# authentik Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "authentik" {
  url   = "https://beryjuorg-dev.my.goauthentik.io"
  token = "foo-bar"
  # Optionally set insecure to ignore TLS Certificates
  # insecure = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **token** (String, Sensitive)
- **url** (String)

### Optional

- **insecure** (Boolean)
